short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add's shortcuts to HBO Max/Go. L/R Arrow: Skip 10 seconds, Up/Down: Change Volume, Space: Pause, C: Skip Commercials

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that add's standard shortcuts HBO Go/Max streaming service. Left/Right Arrow: Skips -10/+10 seconds, Up/Down: Increase/Decrease Volume, Space: Pause Video, C: Skip Commercials (60 Secs)
